channel.title: PI, perm spawn object?

item.title: PI, perm spawn object?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“corpze, post:3, topic:526834”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=645582.msg4342407#msg4342407 date=1375328310]
How about you convert it and not have us do everything. I remember you asking to make this command and everyone made it for you, you did nothing.
Also, you can’t make it write to your java file…
[/quote]
i know, i made a .cfg file… that it should put them in so i can c&p from there[/quote]
Oh, so you made a object.cfg, and you made it load objects out of that instead of the java file, but you can’t do a simple command edit to make it save to the cfg? weird.

Read full topic

item.title: PI, perm spawn object?
item.dc:creator: @corpze corpze
item.description:
@corpze wrote:

hi guys, does anyone have a command that like prints out what that has to be in the objecthandler to spawn an object?
since i cnt seem to convert this command :

if (playerCommand.startsWith("snpc")) { try { BufferedWriter npcspawn = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter( "./Data/cfg/spawn-config.cfg", true)); String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); String npcid = args[1]; String name = args[2]; try { npcspawn.write("spawn = " + npcid + " " + c.absX + " "+ c.absY + " " + c.heightLevel + " 0 0 0 0" + " " + name); c.sendMessage("@gre@You have successfully spawned an npc."); npcspawn.newLine(); } finally { npcspawn.close(); } } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }
so can anyone convert it ? to make it spawn objects ? they have to be like this :

{3086, 3251, 4874, 0, 10}, (x, y, object id, height, face)

Read full topic
